DOC.brief_summary: Specific aim # 1 : To assess study team 's ability recruit subject cohort successfully complete follow-up assessment phone mail . Hypothesis : Over 50 % eligible subject enroll observational study , 70 % follow-up assessment successfully complete . Specific aim # 2 : To determine natural history hopelessness , ongoing suicidal thought , optimism subject 2 , 4 8 week discharge . Hypothesis : Subjects continue moderate level hopelessness , suicidal thought , optimism follow-up assessment .
DOC.brief_title: Natural History Hopelessness , Suicidality , Optimism Psychiatric Inpatients Following Discharge
DOC.detailed_description: Contact information . On day enrollment , contact information ( address , phone number ) obtain subject . Subjects also ask provide contact information family member friend study team may contact case emergency unable get touch subject follow . Subjects unable provide contact information least one family member enrol . Baseline evaluation . On date enrollment , study staff obtain two type information : 1 . Baseline clinical characteristic . Study staff obtain specific clinical variable patient gather information variable could impact level hopelessness/optimism discharge . These variable include : age , gender , # prior admission [ zero , 1-5 , 5 ] , presence substance use disorder ( assessed via inpatient chart review ) , admission suicide attempt suicidal ideation , involvement exercise increase feeling well-being like gratitude , forgiveness , use one 's personal strength , act kindness . 2 . Baseline outcome measure : Study staff also administer six instrument : - Beck Hopelessness Scale ( BHS ) :14 This 21-item scale use assess feeling hopelessness . - Concise Health Risk Tracking Scale ( CHRT ) :15 This 12 item scale use assess presence intensity suicidal thought . - Life Orientation Test-Revised ( LOT-R ) :16 This 10-item scale measure optimism ( pessimism ) . - Positive Affect Negative Affect Schedule ( PANAS ) :17 This well-validated 20-item self-report measure general positive negative affect . - Sheehan Disability Scale:18 This 5 item scale use assess degree subject 's condition disease ( psychological , social , physical ) impact function daily life . - Quick Inventory Depressive Symptomatology , Self Report ( QIDS-SR ) :19 This 16-item questionnaire assess subject 's depressive symptom . It serve additional reliable , valid way gather information subject 's mood . This evaluation take approximately 20-30 minute . Follow-up assessment . Follow-up assessment occur phone mail 2 week , 4 week 8 week . Similar initial assessment , follow-up assessment two component : 1 . Assessment characteristic : Study staff inquire subject ' live situation discharge ( homelessness , live alone ) , employment/academic status , treatment postdischarge ( follow-up therapist , psychiatrist , PCP , group , AA/NA , partial hospital program , treatment form peer support ) , involvement exercise increase feeling well-being like gratitude , forgiveness , use one 's personal strength , act kindness . 2 . Assessment study outcome : Staff readminister five measure , also inquire psychiatric readmission , suicide attempt , episodes self-harm ( cut , burn , banging/hitting body part , ingest toxic materials/objects , intentional non-suicidal self-harm behavior ) . This evaluation take 20-30 minute .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Admission MGH inpatient psychiatric unit , age 18 old Suicidal ideation report admission ( suicidal thought active suicidal ideation document admission note ) OR admission occur context suicide attempt Mood disorder ( assess determine patient 's clinical treatment team consult inpatient chart review ) Patient able read write English Exclusion criterion : Psychotic symptom , assess use MINI12 inpatient chart review Cognitive disorder , assess use sixitem cognitive screen develop research Participation study focus improve hopelessness/optimism .
